Is dystonia 6 inherited ?,"This condition is inherited in an autosomal dominant pattern, which means one copy of the altered gene in each cell can be sufficient to cause the disorder. Some people who inherit the altered gene never develop the condition, a situation known as reduced penetrance.",GHR,dystonia 6
What are the treatments for dystonia 6 ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of dystonia 6:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Dystonia Overview  - Genetic Testing Registry: D
